name: Runners!
description:
Runners is a single player game when you have to jump and avoid falling.

There are 1 map, Three tree

If you reach the finish you'll be a reward, 200 XP! (Also if you will be wasted, you received 150 XP).

GG Good Play!

Version catalog (More details on page "Versions!"):
